content.rendered:
SPACEDESK DRIVER SOFTWARE
FOR WINDOWS PRIMARY PC /SERVER

Unleash the Power of Multi-Monitor Productivity! Expand your digital workspace by seamlessly connecting additional monitors to your setup through network display technology. Whether for work, gaming, or creative endeavors, Spacedesk Driver Software is the ultimate solution for an enhanced visual experience across multiple screens.

SPACEDESK VIEWER SOFTWARE
FOR SECONDARY MACHINE /CLIENT

Transform any device into an additional display! Experience the versatility of extending your desktop real estate with this easy-to-use, intuitive viewer application. Connect to your main system with just a few clicks and enjoy the seamless integration of multiple screens for a truly unified multi-display environment.

HTML 5 App Prerequisites

Please delete the cached files, images and cookies on web browser settings to load the latest HTML5 viewer page. Requires latest version of web browser and operating system. Please update. Mozilla Firefox currently unsupported due to performance limitations

spotlight

DESKTOP DUPLICATION DISPLAY MONITOR SOFTWARE /MIRROR

spacedesk software display extension monitor can cast screen content of primary Windows machine to other mobile devices, laptops and computers over WiFi, USB or network cable.

Download

DESKTOP EXTENSION DISPLAY MONITOR SOFTWARE /EXTENSION

spacedesk software turns mobile devices, laptops and desktops into an additional extension display monitor for Windows machines. Windows can smoothly be moved to and from other connected monitors.

Download

CREATIVE VIDEO
WALL DISPLAY SOFTWARE /VIDEO WALL

spacedesk software video wall can be used for digital signage to display advertisements, dashboards, menus, or even just beautiful scenery to enhance the ambience.

Download

TOUCH, STYLUS-PEN, KEYBOARD AND MOUSE SOFTWARE /INPUT

spacedesk is a software KVM switch (Keyboard Video Mouse). It enables control of a primary Windows machine by mobile devices, laptops and desktops connected over network or USB.

Download

AUDIO PLAYBACK SPEAKER DEVICE SOFTWARE /AUDIO

spacedesk software redirects audio speaker output sound from a primary Windows machine to mobile devices, laptops and desktops connected over network or USB.

Download

MOBILE DEVICE AS WEBCAM /INPUT

spacedesk software display extension monitor can cast screen content of primary Windows machine to other mobile devices, laptops and computers over WiFi, USB or network cable.

Available Soon
